title: The Fad diet circus
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Nutrition - Study and teaching

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Reducing diets
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diet

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Carbohydrates
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Self-care - Health
description: Shows the potential hazards of fad diets, which seldom result in long-term weight loss. Compares two groups of dieters, one on a well balanced diet and the other on a low carbohydrate diet. Shows how both groups lose weight but the low carbohydrate group experiences medical problems.
